title: IVA – Intelligent Virtual Assistant
shortDesc: AI-powered desktop assistant combining generative AI with system-level automation.
details: IVA is a Windows-based intelligent virtual assistant that combines large language models with system automation. It can execute OS-level commands, answer complex queries, respond via voice, and fetch real-time data. Designed with modular architecture and offline-safe execution layers.

title: AuraSnap – Smart Photo Management System
shortDesc: AI-based face recognition system for automated event photo sorting.
details: AuraSnap is an offline-first photo management system designed for events. It uses ArcFace embeddings and clustering to recognize guests, auto-sort photos, apply dynamic watermarks, and distribute albums via WhatsApp while maintaining data privacy.

title: NeuroWall – ML-Based DDoS Protection
shortDesc: Machine learning driven real-time DDoS detection and mitigation platform.
details: NeuroWall analyzes network traffic patterns using anomaly detection models to identify DDoS attacks in real time. It maintains high availability, logs malicious events securely, and supports cloud deployment scenarios.

title: Pawfect Match – Pet Adoption Management System
shortDesc: Desktop application for managing pet adoption workflows and records.
details: Pawfect Match digitizes pet adoption processes including pet inventory, adopter details, billing, and staff workflows. The system is built using a clean MVC architecture and offers a modern UI using CustomTkinter.

title: Gesture & Facial Meme Recognition System
shortDesc: Real-time meme prediction using facial expressions and hand gestures.
details: This system captures temporal facial and hand landmark data using MediaPipe and predicts meme reactions using an LSTM-based deep learning model. It supports both short facial reactions and longer gesture-based actions.
